tag_list: sandeep, sandeep-hegde, student-entrepreneur, student-entrepreneur-india, young-entrepreneur, india-entrepreneur, indian-student-entrepreneur, bangalore-entrepreneur
overview:
Always striving to be different, every stage of his life has been a completely new experience. In this world where many people tend to select easy way out, he wanted to be unique, he wanted to make his mark in society and not be just a spectator. His hunger for knowledge and learning new skills is never ends. He is easily soluble with most of the people and build good relationships that lasts forever.

He is passionate about what he does. He loves to face every challenge with equal zeal and enthusiasm. This has given him a positive view on life where he knows that if he try hard enough anything is possible.

He is ambitious and that was how he started his company “dotCORD” in second year of College. Even as a student he knew what he wanted to do and accomplishing his milestones gave him the greatest satisfaction. His experiences in life has taught him to be enterprising. Every client he came across was different and he had to cater to each persons’ specific needs. This helped him to adapt easily to any situation, a virtue that is very necessary in this changing, modern IT environment.

Apart from business he loves to address students on entrepreneur & technological topics. He also a part of special interest group named IT-Belgaum and have been working towards the awareness of IT in Belgaum & North Karnataka Region.
